summary: An email from defense attorney Martin G. Weinberg to Reid Weingarten, requesting permission to view surveillance video from Jeffrey Epstein's jail cell and hallway at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) from midnight to 7 AM on August 10, 2019. The request is made on behalf of Epstein's prior criminal defense attorneys with the approval of the attorney for his Estate, following Epstein's death.

keyFacts: Epstein's prior criminal defense attorneys, with Estate attorney approval, sought access to surveillance video from his MCC jail cell and hallway for the early morning hours of August 10, 2019.
The request specifically targets video from midnight to 7 AM on August 10, 2019, the timeframe surrounding Epstein's death.
The email indicates ongoing legal interest and investigation into the circumstances of Epstein's death by his former defense team.
The correspondence is marked 'Confidential' and includes standard legal privilege disclaimers.
